meta.title: TradingAI | Perception Lab
meta.description: TradingAI is an AI-powered trading platform delivering daily rule-based and AI-based setups.
hero.title: Perception Lab — AI-powered Market Setups
hero.subtitle: The Perception Engine blends rule-based market analysis with AI to deliver clear, objective, and tradable setups every day.
setups.subtitle: Choose a profile to see relevant setups. Open Analysis for details.
setups.profileFilter.heading: Which setups are you looking for?
setups.profileFilter.intradayHint: Intraday setups are currently available only for assets with 1H/4H candle support (e.g. crypto via Binance).
setups.profileFilter.positionHint: Position setups are rolling out gradually. Check back soon.
homepage.hero.headline: Setup of the Day
homepage.list.headline: More setups
homepage.info.title: What is the Perception Lab?
homepage.info.p1: The Perception Lab blends rule-based market analysis with AI-powered signals. The system scores event strength, market bias, sentiment, and orderflow to produce structured trading setups.
homepage.info.p2: Each setup includes entry zones, stop-loss, take-profit, confidence values, and key market indicators  at a glance and fully emotion-free.
homepage.info.p3: Combining fixed analysis rules with AI models creates a clear, consistent decision framework for your daily trading workflow.
homepage.info.cards.analysis.title: AI-powered analysis
homepage.info.cards.analysis.body: Rule-based systems combined with AI for precise market assessments.
homepage.info.cards.multi.title: Multi-factor scoring
homepage.info.cards.multi.body: Event strength, market bias, sentiment, and orderflow are evaluated systematically.
homepage.info.cards.clear.title: Clear setups
homepage.info.cards.clear.body: Objective setups with entry, stop-loss, take-profit  updated daily.
homepage.info.cards.consistent.title: Consistent decisions
homepage.info.cards.consistent.body: Reproducible analyses without emotional bias or subjective interpretation.
homepage.cta.title: Unlock more setups
homepage.cta.subtitle: Right now you only see a selection. Premium gives you access to all daily setups, AI interpretations, multi-asset analysis, and alerts.
marketing.noSetupOfDay: No setup of the day available.
setups.entry.note.zone: Preferred entry range in the setup structure.
setups.entry.note.limit: Single reference level in the setup structure.
setups.entry.note.market: Reference level with timing sensitivity to live conditions.
setups.entry.note.default: Entry level reference within the setup structure.
setups.stop.note.structure: Structure-based stop along recent swing structure.
setups.stop.note.default: Stop reference level in the setup structure.
setups.takeProfit.note.primary: Primary target reference in the setup structure.
perception.title: Perception Lab  Analysis Engine
perception.subtitle: The Perception Engine blends market structure, events, bias and sentiment into clear setups.
perception.intro1: The Perception Engine processes market structure, events and sentiment to produce daily snapshots with clearly defined setups.
perception.intro2: Sources include structure analysis, macro/micro events and sentiment signals. Each day a snapshot is published on the landing page.
perception.engine.events: Economic data, news and risk factors  score
perception.engine.sentiment: Funding, fear/greed and flow data  bias
perception.snapshotHint: On the landing page you see a daily snapshot of all setups produced. The Perception page explains the underlying system.
perception.today.title: Live snapshot
perception.today.error: Unable to retrieve the latest snapshot.
perception.riskReward.title: Risk/Reward Relationship
perception.riskReward.riskToStop.label: Risk to stop
perception.riskReward.tooltip.rrrDefault: Risk-to-reward ratio describes the relationship between stop distance and target distance.
perception.riskReward.tooltip.rrr.weak: RRR {rrr}: target distance is relatively close to risk distance.
perception.riskReward.tooltip.rrr.ok: RRR {rrr}: risk and target distances are moderately balanced.
perception.riskReward.tooltip.rrr.strong: RRR {rrr}: target distance is materially larger than risk distance.
perception.riskReward.tooltip.volatility: Volatility captures how wild the move is  higher values mean wider swings.
perception.riskReward.rrrNote.weak: RRR {rrr}: target and risk distances are close.
perception.riskReward.rrrNote.ok: RRR {rrr}: target distance is moderately above risk distance.
perception.riskReward.rrrNote.strong: RRR {rrr}: target distance is substantially above risk distance.
perception.rings.tooltip.trend: Trend strength derived from structure, momentum, and volatility.
perception.rings.tooltip.event: Impact of economic and news events on the setup.
perception.rings.tooltip.bias: Modeled market bias capturing structural preferences.
perception.rings.tooltip.orderflow: Capital flow derived from momentum and volatility.
perception.rings.tooltip.confidence: Overall confidence: how well all five rings align.
perception.rings.explainerTitle: The 5 Rings of the Perception Lab
perception.rings.explainerIntro: Each setup is evaluated through five rings that explain why a signal feels strong or weak.
perception.rings.desc.trend: Combines trend structure, momentum, and volatility into a 0100 trend strength score.
perception.rings.desc.event: Rates how strongly economic and news events can affect this setup.
perception.rings.desc.bias: Captures structural market biases such as preferred directions or regimes.
perception.rings.desc.sentiment: Measures market and news sentiment via an AI model.
perception.rings.desc.orderflow: Describes capital flow derived from momentum and volatility.
perception.rings.desc.confidence: Shows how well all five rings align and how confident the model is about the setup.
perception.rings.eventTooltip: Measures volatility shocks, momentum divergence and pattern-based events.
perception.rings.biasTooltip: Highlights the technical bias from trend strength and regime shifts.
perception.rings.sentimentTooltip: Mixes direction, bias strength and momentum energy into a mood indicator.
perception.rings.orderflowTooltip: Signals how strong the active market flow is.
perception.rings.confidenceTooltip: Aggregated meta-signal from the five rings and structural rules.
perception.rings.explainer.event: Event ring captures volatility shocks, momentum divergence and pattern signals.
perception.rings.explainer.bias: Bias ring highlights the prevailing technical direction.
perception.rings.explainer.sentiment: Sentiment ring mixes direction, bias and momentum energy.
perception.rings.explainer.orderflow: Orderflow ring visualizes the strength of active market flows.
perception.rings.explainer.confidence: Confidence is the meta-score from the other rings plus structural filters.
perception.rings.insights.title: Ring insights
perception.eventContext.none: No scheduled events in this window.
perception.generatedAt.label: Generated: {value}
perception.signalQuality.definition: How well trend, event, bias, sentiment, and orderflow align.
perception.confidence.definition: How stable the setup appears (consistency plus market stability).
perception.execution.invalidation.stop.l: Invalid if price clearly falls below the stop zone.
perception.execution.invalidation.stop.s: Invalid if price clearly moves above the stop zone.
perception.execution.invalidation.entryF: Invalid if price trades sustainably outside the entry zone.
perception.execution.invalidation.ringsF: Invalid if trend/bias shift against the setup.
perception.rings.insights.subtitle: Quick heuristics based on todays scores.
perception.rings.confluence.title: Confluence
perception.rings.confluence.mixed: Confluence mixed: drivers {drivers}, weakness {weakness}; confidence {confidence}% ({confBucket}), RRR {rrr}.
perception.rings.confluence.noEdge: No clear confluence: weakness {weakness}; confidence {confidence}% ({confBucket}), RRR {rrr}.
perception.rings.summary.noEdgeLong: No clear edge: all rings are in the middle; treat this more as a watchlist candidate than a high-conviction trade.
perception.rings.summary.noEdgeFact: No clear edge (all rings medium, RRR < 2)
perception.rings.summary.eventDriverLong: The setup is heavily driven by the upcoming macro event  expect volatility around the release window.
perception.rings.insights.trend.low: Trend weak ({score}%) on {timeframe}; {asset} is rangey/pulling back, little directional edge.
perception.rings.insights.trend.medium: Trend moderate ({score}%) on {timeframe}; some direction, but not dominant on {asset}.
perception.rings.insights.trend.high: Strong {direction} trend ({score}%) on {timeframe}; {asset} is clearly trending.
perception.rings.insights.event.low: Event risk low ({score}%); little catalyst impact expected.
perception.rings.insights.event.medium: Event risk moderate ({score}%); keep news in view, recent catalysts priced in.
perception.rings.insights.event.high: Event risk high ({score}%); manage size/stops proactively.
perception.rings.insights.sentiment.low: Sentiment weak ({score}%); crowd skewed against {direction}, reversal risk higher.
perception.rings.insights.sentiment.medi: Sentiment balanced ({score}%); no extreme crowd read.
perception.rings.insights.sentiment.high: Sentiment strong ({score}%); crowd positioned {direction}, watch for overextension.
perception.rings.insights.orderflow.low: Flow weak ({score}%); limited participation, trend may thin out.
perception.rings.insights.orderflow.medi: Flow neutral ({score}%); active market but still fairly light pressure.
perception.rings.insights.orderflow.high: Flow strong ({score}%); {direction} participation backs the setup.
perception.rings.insights.confidence.low: Confidence low ({score}%): signals diverge; observe or trade small.
perception.rings.insights.confidence.med: Confidence medium ({score}%): mixed picture, size accordingly.
perception.rings.insights.confidence.hig: Confidence high ({score}%): rings aligned; setup belongs on the watchlist.
perception.tradeDecision.signal.title: Trade signal
perception.tradeDecision.signal.strongLo: {asset} {direction} on {timeframe}: strong trend/bias backing the move.
perception.tradeDecision.signal.strongSh: {asset} {direction} on {timeframe}: strong trend/bias backing the move.
perception.tradeDecision.signal.coreLong: Drivers in place; risk/rrr balanced for {asset} on {timeframe}.
perception.tradeDecision.signal.coreShor: Drivers in place; risk/rrr balanced for {asset} on {timeframe}.
perception.tradeDecision.signal.cautious: Mixed signals or elevated risk: manage size and timing carefully.
perception.tradeDecision.signal.noEdge.t: No dominant drivers; watchlist or avoid for now.
perception.tradeDecision.signal.confiden: Low conviction – trade tiny or wait
perception.tradeDecision.playbook.title: Trader playbook
perception.tradeDecision.playbook.highEv: Macro: stand aside around the event; avoid fresh entries pre/post release.
perception.tradeDecision.playbook.medium: Macro risk is medium  okay to trade, but expect spikes around headlines.
perception.tradeDecision.playbook.lowEve: Macro tape is calm; focus on structure, flow and execution.
perception.tradeDecision.playbook.lowRRR: RRR weak (<2)  not a core trade.
perception.tradeDecision.playbook.moment: Momentum play  don't fade strong flow.
perception.tradeDecision.playbook.defaul: Align with strongest drivers, respect risk.
perception.tradeDecision.positioning.tim: Event window active – wait for clarity
Trend phase – align entries with structure
features.title: What is the Perception Lab?
features.block1.title: AI-powered analysis
features.block1.text: Rule-based system plus AI for precise market assessments.
features.block2.title: Multi-factor scoring
features.block2.text: Event strength, bias, sentiment and orderflow are evaluated systematically.
features.block3.title: Clear setups
features.block3.text: Objective setups with entry, stop-loss, take-profit  updated daily.
features.block4.title: Consistent decisions
features.block4.text: Reproducible analyses without emotions or subjective bias.
cta.title: Unlock more setups
cta.subtitle: Free shows only a selection. Premium gives you all daily setups, AI interpretations, multi-asset analysis and alerts  all in one place.
pricing.title: Pricing & Plans
pricing.subtitle: Free to start, Premium for active traders, Pro for automation and API.
pricing.free.title: Free
pricing.premium.title: Premium
pricing.pro.title: Pro
pricing.comparison.title: Comparison
pricing.apiInfo.title: API Access
pricing.apiInfo.text: Pro users can access API and webhooks to pull setups & scores into their own systems. More details in the docs.
setup.header.timeHelp: Generated is render/build time. As of is the market snapshot timestamp.
setup.decisionSummary.interpretation.str: Context indicates strong alignment for {direction} conditions.
setup.decisionSummary.interpretation.par: Context indicates partial alignment for {direction} conditions.
setup.decisionSummary.interpretation.con: Context indicates confirmation is required before execution.
setup.decisionSummary.interpretation.noE: Context indicates no clear directional edge.
setup.decisionSummary.interpretation.blo: Context indicates elevated event constraints for {direction} conditions.
setup.decisionSummary.interpretation.noT: Context indicates quality or constraint thresholds are not met.
setup.decisionSummary.uncertainty.label: Context uncertainty
setup.decisionSummary.basedOn.label: Based on
setup.decisionSummary.title: Decision Summary
setup.decisionSummary.disclaimer.long: This summary describes model context and constraints. It does not provide directives or guarantees.
setup.execution.levels.help: Entry, stop, and target levels describe the setup structure.
setup.execution.rrr.help: RRR describes the ratio between risk distance and target distance.
setup.execution.disclaimer.short: Execution levels describe the setup structure and are not instructions.
setup.sections.inputMetrics.help: These values are component metrics and do not replace the overall interpretation.
setup.sections.overallInterpretation.hel: This section summarizes the current context at a high level.
setup.phase4a.scoresContext: Input metrics provide context and are not outcome statements.
setup.phase4a.scoresContext.help: Read these values together with the overall interpretation.
setup.phase4a.interpretationFraming.help: This summary interprets metrics and drivers as descriptive context.
setup.phase4a.executionFraming.line: Structural levels for reference context (not instructions).
setup.phase4a.driversFraming.line: Drivers explain interpretation context as supporting factors.
setup.scoreDrivers.signal.coreContextSta: Core signal context is stable across available drivers.
setup.scoreDrivers.signal.trendBiasConfl: Trend and bias drivers are not fully aligned.
setup.scoreDrivers.signal.trendBiasAlign: Trend and bias drivers are aligned.
setup.scoreDrivers.signal.orderflowStron: Orderflow is a supportive driver in the current context.
Orderflow is a limiting driver in the current context.
setup.scoreDrivers.signal.sentimentExtre: Sentiment is at an extreme and may reduce stability.
Confidence is low relative to other drivers.
footer.copy: {year} TradingAI  Perception Lab. All rights reserved.
footer.risk: No financial advice. Trading involves risk.
docs.overview.title: TradingAI Docs  Overview
docs.overview.intro: A quick start into the TradingAI API, setups and automation.
docs.overview.whatYouCanDo.title: What you can do with the API
docs.overview.whatYouCanDo.setups.title: Fetch daily setups
docs.overview.whatYouCanDo.setups.body: Pull all daily setups including entry/SL/TP, confidence and scores.
docs.overview.whatYouCanDo.events.title: Score events
docs.overview.whatYouCanDo.events.body: Capture macro events, news and risk factors and feed them into workflows.
docs.overview.whatYouCanDo.sentiment.bod: Query funding, flow and sentiment signals to identify market tendencies.
docs.overview.whatYouCanDo.automation.bo: Trigger webhooks, cron jobs and custom alerts based on scores and setups.
docs.overview.quickstart.title: Quickstart
docs.overview.quickstart.step1Body: Create an API key in your account (Pro/Enterprise).
docs.overview.quickstart.step2Body: Call the setups endpoint and filter by symbol/timeframe.
docs.overview.quickstart.step3Body: Use webhooks or cron jobs to watch scores and send alerts.
docs.overview.concepts.title: Core Concepts
docs.overview.concepts.setup: Setup: Structured trading plan with entry, SL, TP and confidence.
docs.overview.concepts.event: Event: Macro/news incident with weighting for risk/volatility.
docs.overview.concepts.score: Score: Weighted value from event, bias, sentiment, balance.
docs.overview.concepts.stream: Streams: Data streams (setups, scores, events) for automation.
docs.overview.limits.title: Limits & Fair Use
docs.overview.limits.point1: Rate limits protect stability  avoid excessive bursts.
docs.overview.limits.point2: Setups are snapshots per day/timeframe; no tick feed.
docs.overview.limits.point3: API keys are personal; do not expose them publicly.
docs.api.title: API Reference
docs.api.intro: Fetch setups, scores and events via the TradingAI API.
docs.api.auth.title: Authentication
docs.api.auth.body: Use a Bearer token (API key) from your account under API Keys. Send it in the Authorization header.
docs.api.endpoints.title: Core Endpoints
docs.api.endpoints.setupDetail: GET /v1/setups/{id}  Detail of a setup incl. scores.
docs.api.endpoints.events: GET /v1/events  Relevant macro/news events with scores.
docs.api.endpoints.sentiment: GET /v1/sentiment  Sentiment and bias data per asset.
docs.api.notes.title: Notes
docs.api.notes.body: Mind rate limits and pagination. Check dates (snapshot per day/timeframe).
docs.webhooks.title: Webhooks
docs.webhooks.intro: Receive events and setups via push as soon as new data is available.
docs.webhooks.howItWorks.title: How it works
docs.webhooks.howItWorks.step1: Register your webhook URL in your account.
docs.webhooks.events.title: Events
docs.webhooks.security.title: Security
docs.webhooks.security.body: Verify signatures, keep secrets private, consider replay protection (timestamp/nonce).
docs.sdks.title: SDKs
docs.sdks.intro: Use TradingAI easily via SDKs for your preferred language.
docs.sdks.languages.title: Supported SDKs
docs.sdks.installation.title: Installation
docs.sdks.nextSteps.title: Next steps
docs.sdks.nextSteps.body: Test auth, make your first setup call, then configure alerts/automation.
docs.examples.title: Examples
docs.examples.intro: Short snippets to get started with the API.
docs.examples.example1.title: TypeScript: Fetch setups
docs.examples.example1.body: Example GET /v1/setups call with API key and a simple filter.
docs.examples.example2.title: Python: Fetch setups
docs.examples.example2.body: Example using requests against the setups endpoint.
docs.examples.notes.title: Notes
docs.examples.notes.body: Use test/sandbox keys and respect rate limits before going to production.
setupGenerator.title: Setup Generator
setupGenerator.intro: Generate a sample setup based on asset, timeframe and risk profile.
setupGenerator.mockExplanation: This setup was generated based on your chosen parameters:
marketSummary.title: Market Summary AI
marketSummary.intro: Generate an AI-powered market overview for an asset and a time range.
marketSummary.mockSummary: The market summary is based on your parameters for
eventInterpreter.title: Event Interpreter
eventInterpreter.intro: Analyze a market event and get an AI-based view on bias, risk and volatility.
eventInterpreter.mockExplanation: The assessment is based on the event
riskManager.title: Risk Manager
riskManager.intro: Calculate position size and per-trade risk based on account size, risk percent and stop distance.
riskManager.result.title: Result
riskManager.result.hintTemplate: With this setup you risk about {{riskPercent}} % of your account. Ensure this matches your style.
riskManager.result.warning: Note: Trading with leverage and derivatives carries high risk. This is not financial advice.
aiToolsHub.title: AI Tools
aiToolsHub.intro: Use specialized AI modules for setups, market overviews, event analysis and risk management.
aiToolsHub.tools.setupGenerator.title: Setup Generator
aiToolsHub.tools.setupGenerator.descript: Generate sample setups based on asset, timeframe and risk profile.
aiToolsHub.tools.marketSummary.title: Market Summary AI
aiToolsHub.tools.marketSummary.descripti: Get an AI-powered market overview for sentiment, trend and events.
aiToolsHub.tools.eventInterpreter.title: Event Interpreter
aiToolsHub.tools.eventInterpreter.descri: Let macro/news events be scored and receive a view on bias, risk and volatility.
aiToolsHub.tools.riskManager.title: Risk Manager
aiToolsHub.tools.riskManager.description: Calculate position size, risk and max loss based on your account size.
aiToolsHub.tools.screenshotAnalysis.desc: Upload chart screenshots and get a visual AI assessment.
screenshotAnalysis.title: Screenshot Analysis
screenshotAnalysis.intro: The visual AI-based chart analysis will be available here soon.
screenshotAnalysis.comingSoonBody: The screenshot analysis module is currently in development. Soon you'll be able to upload chart images and receive AI-powered insights.
perception.howItWorksTitle: How does the Perception Engine work?
perception.howItWorksText: Modules score market structure, events and sentiment, produce confidence and pick a setup of the day.
perception.outputText: Daily 2040 setups with entry/SL/TP, scores and a setup of the day.
perception.engineMeta.title: Perception Engine status
premium.eventsTeaser.title: Events & Bias
premium.eventsTeaser.text: Today's high-impact events can influence execution timing; relevant impact appears inside each setup.
events.title: Today's Events
events.subtitle: Macro, crypto and on-chain events that can affect execution timing and volatility.
events.modifierHint: Event impact shows up inside each setup when relevant.
events.symbols.label: Symbols
events.nextUp.title: Next up
bias.title: Market Bias
bias.subtitle: Bias per symbol and timeframe. Alignment, confidence and short notes.
perceptionHistory.title: Perception history
perceptionHistory.subtitle: Previous perception snapshots with setup of the day and context.
premium.info: You see all setups for today, split into free, premium and pro.
proNotice.title: Soon Pro-only
proNotice.text.default: This area will be available to Pro members only in the future. For now, you can still explore all content without restrictions.
proNotice.text.default.pro: You already enjoy full Pro access to everything in this area.
proNotice.text.setupsPremium: Premium and Pro setups will only be available to Pro members in the future. At the moment, you can still see the full list.
proNotice.text.setupsPremium.pro: Youre already enjoying full Pro access to all Premium and Pro setups.
proNotice.text.aiTools: The AI tools will become a Pro-only feature in the future. Right now, you can still use them without any limitations.
proNotice.text.aiTools.pro: You already have Pro access to all AI tools.
proNotice.text.backtesting: Backtesting capabilities will become an exclusive Pro feature. Currently, they are still unlocked for everyone.
proNotice.text.backtesting.pro: As a Pro member, you have full access to backtesting capabilities.
proNotice.text.docs: Extended documentation and deep-dive guides will be reserved for Pro members in the future. For now, everything remains open.
proNotice.text.docs.pro: As a Pro member, you have access to all extended documentation and deep-dive guides.
backtesting.overview.title: Backtesting
backtesting.overview.subtitle: Quick access to all backtesting modules.
backtesting.overview.sections.title: Modules
backtesting.overview.links.eventDesc: Analyze market reactions to events and evaluate setups.
backtesting.overview.links.replayDesc: Replay setups in historical market conditions.
legal.imprint.title: Imprint
legal.imprint.vatText: No VAT is charged in accordance with  19 UStG (Small Business Regulation).
legal.imprint.liabilityText: The content of this website has been created with the greatest care. However, we cannot guarantee the accuracy, completeness or timeliness of the information provided. As a service provider, we are responsible for our own content in accordance with  7(1) TMG. According to  810 TMG, we are not obligated to monitor transmitted or stored third-party information.
legal.imprint.externalLinksText: This website may contain links to external third-party websites. We have no influence over the content of these sites. The respective provider is responsible for the content. Permanent monitoring is not reasonable without concrete evidence of legal violations.
legal.imprint.noInvestmentAdviceText: All setups, analyses, entry/stop/take-profit levels and scores are provided for informational and educational purposes only. They do not constitute financial, investment or trading advice and should not be interpreted as recommendations to buy or sell financial instruments. Users act at their own risk. Past performance does not guarantee future results. AI-generated content may contain errors.
legal.imprint.mediaLawText: Content responsible person according to  18(2) MStV: the operator named above (Sole Proprietorship).
legal.imprint.hostingText: Hosting is provided by Vercel Inc., 440 N Barranca Ave #4133, Covina, CA 91723, USA.
legal.imprint.disputeText: The European Commission provides a platform for online dispute resolution: https://ec.europa.eu/consumers/odr. We are neither obligated nor willing to participate in dispute resolution procedures before a consumer arbitration board.
legal.privacy.title: Privacy Policy
legal.privacy.responsibleText: The entity responsible for data processing on this website is the operator listed in the imprint.
legal.privacy.dataProcessingText: We process personal data only to the extent necessary for operating this platform. This includes account data, usage data, log data, payment information and technical data. Processing is based on Art. 6(1)(b) GDPR and Art. 6(1)(f) GDPR.
legal.privacy.loginText: We use Clerk (Clerk Inc., USA) for authentication and account management. Clerk processes email, login behavior, session and device information. Details: https://clerk.com/privacy.
legal.privacy.paymentsText: Payments are processed via external providers (e.g., Stripe). Payment and invoice data and transaction details are processed as required for billing.
legal.privacy.hostingText: Our platform is hosted by Vercel Inc. (USA). Vercel processes logs, IP addresses and diagnostic data.
legal.privacy.cookiesText: We use cookies for essential functionality and analysis. Non-essential cookies require your consent under Art. 6(1)(a) GDPR.
legal.privacy.analyticsText: Analytics data may be used to improve the platform. Processing only occurs if legally permitted or based on consent.
legal.privacy.aiText: Our platform generates automated AI evaluations (e.g., sentiment, scores, setups). Inputs, metadata and model parameters may be processed. No sensitive data is stored long-term. AI outputs may contain errors.
legal.privacy.rightsText: You have the right to access, rectification, deletion, restriction, objection and data portability under Art. 1521 GDPR.
legal.privacy.securityText: We use SSL/TLS encryption and modern security mechanisms to protect your data.
legal.privacy.retentionText: Personal data is stored only as long as necessary for platform usage or legal requirements.
legal.privacy.revocationText: You may revoke previously granted consent at any time with effect for the future.
legal.terms.title: Terms & Conditions
legal.terms.scopeText: These Terms & Conditions apply to all contracts between the operator and users regarding the provision of digital content, analyses, setups and tools.
legal.terms.servicesText: We provide a digital trading analysis platform. All content is for information and education only and does not constitute financial, investment or trading advice. Past performance does not guarantee future results. AI content may contain errors. No entitlement to certain functions or permanent availability exists.
legal.terms.subscriptionText: Premium and Pro features are available via paid subscriptions. Prices, durations, renewals and cancellation terms are shown during checkout. By purchasing digital access, you agree to immediate fulfillment and waive your right of withdrawal under Art. 356(5) BGB.
legal.terms.liabilityText: Trading financial instruments carries substantial risk. We assume no liability for losses or decisions made using our content. AI-generated or automated insights may contain errors.
legal.terms.finalText: German law applies. If any provision is invalid, the remaining provisions remain unaffected.
perception.narrative.title: Trader Market Note
perception.narrative.flowLow: Flow is weak; positioning looks cautious.
perception.narrative.eventHigh: Macro event risk is high; timing is crucial.
perception.narrative.eventMedium: Macro risk is active; headline spikes possible.
perception.narrative.confluenceNone: No clear edge; signals stay mixed.
perception.narrative.finalWatch: Treat it as a watchlist candidate.
perception.impactSummary.title: Impact overview
perception.setupRating.title: Setup rating
perception.scoreBreakdown.title: Score breakdown
perception.scoreBreakdown.subtitle: Ring scores at a glance
perception.scoreBreakdown.tooltip.trend: Strong or weak structural trend backing the setup.
perception.trend.heading: Trend
perception.trend.summary.low: Trend backdrop is weak; expect choppy participation.
perception.trend.summary.medium: Trend backdrop is mixed; align entries with structure.
perception.trend.summary.high: Trend is dominant; pullbacks are likely to be bought.
perception.trend.empty: Trend data unavailable for this setup.
perception.bias.heading: Bias
perception.bias.summary.high: Bias is strong; signals have tailwind.
perception.bias.empty: Bias data unavailable for this setup.
perception.event.heading: Event risk
perception.event.summary.low: No event risk in sight; catalysts unlikely to move the tape.
perception.event.summary.medium: Moderate event risk - keep catalysts on the radar.
perception.event.summary.high: Elevated event risk - expect volatility spikes.
perception.event.empty: No event data available for this setup.
perception.event.why.heading: Why this matters
perception.event.notes.hashFallbackHint: Fallback hash-based scoring used (no live data).
perception.event.notes.calmWindowHelp: No high-impact events detected in the setup window. Event-driven volatility risk is currently low.
events.risk.highSoon: Event Risk: High – major event soon
events.confidence.calm: Event risk is low and does not reduce confidence.
events.confidence.elevated: Confidence moderated by clustered economic releases.
events.confidence.highSoon: Confidence reduced due to an imminent high-impact event.
events.confidence.unknown: Event confidence unavailable due to missing data.
events.adjustment.elevated: Event adjustment: - due to clustered economic releases.
events.adjustment.highSoon: Event adjustment: - due to imminent high-impact release.
events.execution.highSoon: Avoid new entries within {minutes} minutes of {event}.
events.execution.elevated: Expect elevated volatility while clustered releases hit this window.
events.execution.calm: No event-driven timing constraints right now.
events.risk.badgeTooltip.calm: Derived from calm events in your setup window.
events.risk.badgeTooltip.elevated: Derived from clustered releases in your setup window.
events.risk.badgeTooltip.highSoon: Alert: upcoming high-impact event in your setup window.
events.risk.badgeTooltip.unknown: Risk data fallback (hash or DB error); see audit logs.
perception.context.structureNeutral: Structure: neutral – no additional structure notes.
perception.context.marketSecondary: Shows how the rule-based bias aligns with setup direction.
perception.context.eventSecondary: Upcoming catalysts and their expected impact.
perception.context.structureSecondary: Use key levels and recent swings for entry management.
perception.context.volatilitySecondary: Adjust position size and stop distance to current volatility.
perception.eventStrip.title: Event micro timing
perception.eventStrip.noneDetail: No major releases on deck; focus on structure.
perception.sentiment.inspector.title: Sentiment read
perception.sentiment.summary.extreme_bul: Extreme bullish sentiment; participants chase upside aggressively.
perception.sentiment.summary.bullish: Bullish sentiment provides a clear tailwind.
perception.sentiment.summary.neutral: Sentiment is balanced - no strong crowd edge.
perception.sentiment.summary.extreme_bea: Extreme bearish sentiment warns of contrarian risk.
perception.sentiment.empty: No sentiment data available for this setup.
perception.setup.sections.impactHint: High-level view of drivers, risks and confluence.
perception.setup.sections.narrativeHint: Full text narrative for deeper context around this setup.
perception.setup.sections.aiHint: Condensed AI-generated summary of the key factors.
perception.execution.title: Execution context
perception.execution.bullets.sizing.stro: High conviction – core or full-size entries are justified.
perception.execution.bullets.sizing.core: Balanced conviction – deploy base size with standard risk.
perception.execution.bullets.sizing.caut: Mixed signals – trade partial size and tighten stops.
perception.execution.bullets.sizing.noEd: No clear edge – better to observe than to force trades.
perception.execution.bullets.event.high: Event-heavy window – sync execution with releases or wait for clarity.
perception.execution.bullets.event.mediu: Catalysts active – watch liquidity and timing around the events.
perception.execution.bullets.event.low: Calm calendar – focus on structure and flow for entries.
perception.execution.bullets.focus.trend: Use trend/bias alignment; work entries near structure.
perception.execution.bullets.focus.flow: Momentum/flow drives the idea – let tape confirm your timing.
perception.execution.bullets.focus.senti: Sentiment extremes are the tell – fade only with discipline.
perception.execution.bullets.focus.struc: Structure-bound setup – respect zones and invalidate quickly.
perception.execution.intraday.title: Intraday execution
perception.execution.intraday.critical.w: Wait for release/statement; avoid pre-release breakout
perception.execution.intraday.critical.c: Confirm after release (1H close/retest) before entry
perception.execution.intraday.context.bu: Use a wider buffer around the event; avoid chasing first move
perception.execution.intraday.context.co: Require level confirmation (1H close/retest) before sizing up
Monitor context; execute only on clean level confirmation
perception.execution.intraday.base.confi: Wait for 1H confirmation or clean retest before entry
perception.execution.intraday.base.size: Prefer partial fills and size down vs swing sizing
perception.execution.position.title: Position execution
perception.execution.position.baseRisk: Wider stops and smaller size; plan for longer holds
perception.execution.position.baseConfir: Wait for weekly/daily level confirmation or pullback before initiating
perception.execution.position.baseReview: Reassess on weekly close or key level break; avoid over-trading midweek
perception.execution.position.critical.d: Avoid initiating right before the event; wait for post-event weekly/daily confirmation
perception.execution.position.context.vo: Factor expected volatility; consider delaying entries until after event
perception.execution.bulletA.eventDriven: Event window is active; use conservative parameter interpretation until reaction stabilizes.
perception.execution.bulletB.eventDriven: Use post-event confirmation as the primary structure reference.
perception.execution.bulletA.highConvict: Drivers are aligned; use standard structure references for level mapping.
perception.execution.bulletB.highConvict: Pullback and structure-break zones remain the primary parameter references.
perception.execution.bulletA.balanced: Context is mixed-to-balanced; keep risk and level parameters explicit.
perception.execution.bulletB.balanced: Use confirmation at structure zones before treating levels as active.
perception.execution.bulletA.cautious: Signal mix is constrained; interpret levels with tighter parameter discipline.
perception.execution.bulletB.cautious: Use structure and flow as context references for level validity.
perception.execution.collapsed.eventName: {event} (high impact) — event timing can affect level stability.
perception.execution.collapsed.eventGene: High-impact macro window — event timing can affect level stability.
perception.execution.collapsed.primary.e: Event-sensitive context — prioritize post-event level validation.
perception.execution.collapsed.primary.o: Orderflow context is strong; momentum may support level interaction.
Orderflow context is weak; level interaction may remain limited.
perception.execution.collapsed.primary.c: Trend/Bias are mixed — additional level confirmation is required.
perception.execution.collapsed.primary.s: High alignment context — standard parameter sizing remains valid.
Balanced context — standard parameter sizing remains valid.
Mixed context — reduced parameter sizing remains valid.
perception.onboarding.setupIntroTitle: New here? Learn how to read this setup.
perception.onboarding.decision.title: Decision layer
perception.onboarding.decision.descripti: Here you see direction, levels, risk/reward and the final trade signal. This is where your trade decision happens.
perception.onboarding.drivers.title: Drivers & risks
perception.onboarding.drivers.descriptio: This section explains why the setup is rated the way it is: ring insights, confluence and your trader playbook.
perception.onboarding.details.title: Context & events
perception.onboarding.details.descriptio: Here you can dive deeper: market context, event risk, narrative and AI summary, plus debug info if needed.
perception.orderflow.title: Orderflow
perception.orderflow.noData.headline: Insufficient intraday data
perception.orderflow.noData.body: Orderflow is neutral because there is not enough recent intraday activity to derive a strong flow signal.
perception.orderflow.empty: No orderflow data available for this setup.
perception.signalQuality.label: Signal quality
perception.metaSignals.heading: Setup quality & conviction
perception.signalQuality.description: Assesses how well trend, event, bias, sentiment, and orderflow align, including event risk and flow strength.
perception.confidence.detail: Engine conviction from combined ring coherence and market stability.
perception.confidence.description: Measures engine conviction based on strength, consistency, and coherence of the ring signals plus market stability.
perception.impactPlaybook.heading: Impact & playbook
perception.impactPlaybook.summaryFallbac: AI summary not available for this setup.
perception.tradeDecision.positioning.tim: Timing good ? steady flow, event risk low/medium.
Timing ok ? watch catalysts, consider partials.
Timing risky ? event risk high or low confidence; wait or reduce size.
Trend-follow timing ? structure and bias aligned.
Flow-driven timing ? momentum/tape enable tactical entries.
Event-risk timing ? keep dry powder until catalysts pass.
perception.setupRating.rating.A: Strong directional drivers and solid structure.

admin.ops.marketdata.runAllLabel: Leave empty to sync all active assets.

admin.audit.subtitle: Latest ops actions and snapshot builds.
admin.audit.empty: No runs found for the selected filters.
admin.assets.title: Assets
admin.assets.description: Catalog records for symbols, names, classes, and active status used across admin workflows.
admin.assets.notice: Catalog data is used by playbooks and backtests. Changes can affect evaluations.
admin.events.title: Events
admin.events.description: Economic calendar entries used by playbooks and event-aware setup logic.
admin.events.notice: High-impact events can influence setup decisions and execution filters.
admin.import.assetsDescription: Upload an assets CSV, run a strict dry-run preview, and apply only after explicit confirmation.
admin.import.eventsDescription: Upload an events CSV, validate with dry-run preview, and apply only when the preview is clean.
admin.import.dryRunNotice: Dry-run is required first. Apply is only enabled after a successful preview with zero errors.
admin.import.errorsFix: Fix CSV errors and run preview again before applying.
admin.import.previewMismatch: Preview mismatch. Re-run preview with the same file before apply.
admin.backtests.title: Backtests
admin.backtests.description: Run deterministic simulations, compare runs, and analyze result quality.
admin.backtests.notice: Runs can take time. Compare A/B carefully and export results when needed.
admin.artifacts.title: Artifact Version Browser
admin.artifacts.description: Read-only browser for persisted artifact files and their versions.
admin.artifacts.notice: Artifacts are historical snapshots. No files are generated or modified from this page.
admin.artifacts.tools.label: Tools
admin.artifacts.emptyType: No artifact files found for this type.
admin.artifacts.empty.baseDirMissing: Base directory is missing in this deployment.
admin.artifacts.empty.allDescription: No supported artifact versions were found in the configured directories.
admin.artifacts.empty.hint: Artifacts are generated by scheduled runs and phase jobs.
admin.artifacts.error.title: Artifact error
admin.artifacts.error.invalidSelection: Invalid artifact selection. Please choose a valid type and file.
admin.artifacts.error.fileNotFound: The selected artifact file does not exist or is not accessible.
admin.artifacts.error.typeMismatch: Compare requires two files from the same artifact type.
admin.artifacts.error.readFailed: Artifact file could not be read as JSON.
admin.artifacts.summary.title: Summary
admin.artifacts.raw.title: Raw JSON
admin.artifacts.view.raw.tooLarge: Raw JSON is too large to display safely. Use the summary view instead.
admin.artifacts.view.title: Artifact Detail
admin.artifacts.view.description: Inspect file metadata, summary fields, and raw JSON preview.
admin.artifacts.compare.title: Artifact Compare
admin.artifacts.compare.description: Compare two artifact versions using lightweight summary deltas.
admin.artifacts.compare.sameFile: Both selections point to the same file. Metrics below should be identical.
admin.artifacts.type.joinStats.label: Join Stats
admin.outcomes.header.explorer.title: Outcomes Explorer
admin.outcomes.header.explorer.descripti: Live DB-driven view of recent Swing setups and outcomes. Use Overview for artifact aggregates.
admin.outcomes.header.explorer.notice: DB-driven snapshot; filters and exports reflect live database state.
admin.outcomes.header.overview.title: Outcomes Overview
admin.outcomes.header.overview.descripti: Artifact-based aggregates generated periodically. May lag behind the Explorer.
admin.outcomes.header.overview.notice: Artifact-based summary; for data integrity questions, see Diagnostics.
admin.outcomes.header.diagnostics.title: Outcomes Diagnostics
admin.outcomes.header.diagnostics.descri: Artifact pipeline diagnostics (join coverage, missing dimensions, staleness).
admin.outcomes.header.diagnostics.notice: Use this when artifacts look off; it reflects the artifact pipeline, not live DB.
admin.outcomes.header.engineHealth.title: Engine Health (Forward Cohort)
admin.outcomes.header.engineHealth.descr: DB-driven forward cohort evaluation; interpret open/closed/expiry states here.
admin.outcomes.header.engineHealth.notic: Forward-looking, DB-driven cohort. Use Swing Performance only for legacy breakdowns.
admin.outcomes.header.swingPerformance.d: Legacy artifact-based performance breakdowns by asset/playbook.
admin.outcomes.header.swingPerformance.n: Legacy view: overlaps with Engine Health. Still useful for deep asset/playbook breakdowns; prefer Engine Health + Overview for current metrics.
admin.snapshots.title: Snapshots
admin.snapshots.subtitle: Browse and inspect stored perception snapshots.
admin.snapshots.notice: Read-only snapshot inventory and drilldown for setup diagnostics.
admin.snapshots.filters.label: Label
admin.snapshots.table.label: Label

admin.snapshotDetail.setups.heading: Setups
admin.snapshotDetail.setups.empty: No setups stored in this snapshot.
admin.snapshotDetail.sort.label: Sort by
admin.marketdata.title: Market data health
admin.marketdata.subtitle: Freshness overview for Yahoo (1D) and Binance (multi-timeframe).
admin.marketdata.notice: Track stale assets and freshness gates; use Audit Trail for run-level details.
admin.coverage.title: Coverage
admin.coverage.description: Completeness matrix across assets and timeframes, with freshness status per bucket.
admin.coverage.notice: Use this to spot coverage gaps, then investigate via Market Data Health and Operations.
admin.reports.title: Health Reports
admin.reports.description: Artifact-based weekly health reports generated periodically for monitoring.
admin.reports.notice: Read-only artifact reports; they can lag behind live DB-driven admin views.
admin.reports.empty: No reports found. Ensure files exist under reports/weekly/*.md.
admin.reports.detail.title: Health Report
admin.ops.notice: Actions can trigger jobs. Use with care.
admin.audit.notice: Read-only audit trail of cron, admin, and UI-triggered runs.
admin.system.notice: Read-only health surface. Use Operations to trigger corrective jobs.
admin.marketdata.provider.heading: Provider overview
admin.marketdata.staleAssets.title: Stale assets

admin.snapshots.diff.title: Changes vs. previous snapshot
admin.snapshots.diff.noPrevious: No previous snapshot available for comparison.
admin.snapshots.diff.thresholdHint: Quality ≥ 5 pts or ring delta ≥ 10 pts

admin.eventsEnrichment.title: Events AI enrichment
admin.eventsEnrichment.description: Monitor AI-generated summaries and debug enrichment runs.
admin.eventsEnrichment.philosophy.title: AI policy
admin.eventsEnrichment.philosophy.body: Only high-value events receive AI summaries. Macro noise stays deterministic, no trading predictions, and page loads never call AI.
admin.eventsDedup.title: Event dedup sweep
admin.eventsDedup.description: Merge duplicate calendar entries within a constrained rolling window.
admin.eventsDedup.realRunWarning: This run will delete duplicates permanently.
admin.eventsEnrichment.manualDisabled: Manual trigger disabled while enrichment is off.
